utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It’s okay, it’s okay.

utterance.speaker: JIM BECKETT

utterance.content: 78 over 56.

utterance.content: Okay, I got this.

utterance.content: Dr. Davidson.

utterance.content: Suction.

utterance.content: Here’s a 3 O.

utterance.content: Snipers? At a funeral?

utterance.content: We think the people that sent those guys after Montgomery targeted Beckett.

utterance.content: I tried to get to her. I tried –

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.content: This is your fault!

utterance.content: You did this! This is your fault!

utterance.content: Leave him alone!

utterance.content: Stop it!

utterance.content: Paddles!

utterance.content: He’s right, you know. This is my fault.

utterance.content: Charging. Charged.

utterance.content: When can I see her?

utterance.content: Well, once the nurses get her settled we’ll bring you back to her. The rest of you should go home, get some rest.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: I don’t know about you, bro, but home is the last place I’m going. Not until we catch the son of a b*itch who did this.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Right behind you.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: We’re fine. Go.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Are you okay?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: This is the shooter’s rifle. It’s clean for prints. Lab’s running a trace right now for DNA.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, what about the gun? Can we track the gun?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: According to the DOD, the serial number matches a weapon that was issued to one Martin Holst, a Navy Seal what was killed in action 7 years ago. His body was recovered in a subsequent mission but the weapon was not. Anything from the K-9 unit?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Dogs picked up a scent, traced it to the west side of the cemetery, but then they lost it there.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: In a sea of cops, how does this guy go unnoticed?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: He may not have. Half the guys we talked to remembered seeing a groundskeeper taking cover from the shooter behind a tree. But according to the grounds staff, none of them were in the area.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: He blended in during the chaos and then disappeared.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: If this guy’s some pro for hire he could be halfway to Cuba by now.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Well then, we’ll go to Cuba and find his ass.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It just doesn’t make any sense. It was supposed to be over. Montgomery sacrificed himself, killing Lockwood and all his guys. He said he was ending it. He said he was doing it to keep her safe. So if the plan was to keep her safe, why the hell are they still coming after her?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: I don’t know, bro. God knows who else is involved.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Castle. Yeah. Are you sure?

utterance.speaker: JOSH
utterance.content: Well, this bracelet looks good on you. It’s not diamonds, but …

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Hey, Castle.

utterance.speaker: JOSH
utterance.content: I’ll see you after rounds.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You’re staring at me. I must look … really bad.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No. I just never thought I’d see you again.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I heard you were opening a flower store, so I thought I’d pitch in.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: They were all here when I woke up. I think they’re mostly from the precinct. I don’t think I’m going to live this one down, Castle.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh, probably not.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I hear that you tried to save me.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah, I um …

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You heard? You don’t remember me tackling you?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No, I don’t remember much of anything.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I, um, I remember that I was on the podium and I remember everything just going black.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You don’t remember …

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: … the gun shot?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: They say that there’s some things that are better not being remembered.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I keep seeing his face, Castle. Every time I close my eyes I see Montgomery lying on the hangar floor. You should have let me go in there.

utterance.content: They would have killed you.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Oh, you don’t know that.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Kate …

utterance.content: Castle, I’m really tired right now.

utterance.content: Of course. Of course. We’ll talk tomorrow.

utterance.content: I just need a little bit of time.

utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.content: It’s okay. You don’t have to make excuses. We know you missed us. That’s why you couldn’t stay away.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT

utterance.content: So … anything?

utterance.content: Still nowhere.

utterance.content: Well, what about the groundskeeper?

utterance.content: Why? What happened?

utterance.content: Nothing happened. I just needed some time.

utterance.content: He was here with us, every day, working the case.

utterance.content: For months. He’d still be here if the new captain hadn’t kicked him to the curb.

utterance.content: She kicked him out? Why?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Apparently her precinct’s got no room for, uh … “dilettante writer playing cop”. Captain Victoria Gates, aka Iron Gates. She’s as by the book as they come. She cut her teeth as a detective in Internal Affairs.

utterance.content: Wow. That’s not going to win her any popularity points.

utterance.content: Hey, if she hasn’t talked to Castle she doesn’t know about the bank yet.

utterance.content: What bank?

utterance.content: Oh, well, we didn’t get any traction with the shooter, so Castle suggested we check out Montgomery, McCallister, and Raglan, see who they might have been in business with back in the day.

utterance.content: Wha - she shut the case down? Why?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: No new leads on the shooter. And we couldn’t tell her the rest of it without implicating Captain Montgomery.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Ma’am?

utterance.content: If my mother drops by, you can call her ma’am. Call me sir or captain.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Detective Beckett, back on active, as of today.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Detective Beckett. Your reputation precedes you. Youngest woman in the NYPD to make detective. You beat me by six weeks.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I didn’t realize that people kept score.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Everybody keeps score, Detective. Especially those downtown.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Looks like you passed you psych eval, so welcome back.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Thank you. I – I’ll also need my gun.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Not until you re-qualify.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’m sorry?

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: You were on disability for three months. Reg says you don’t get your piece back until you re-qualify.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And what about my case? What did reg say about that?

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Three months with no leads and every day more homicides coming through that door. How long did you expect me to let those folks tread water? There were good people on this case. There just isn’t anything out there.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’m sorry, sir, but with all due respect, those people aren’t me.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Excuse me?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: The people you had working this case. They’re not me.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Look, I don’t know what kind of shop Montgomery was running here but it’ll be a cold day in hell when I let a cop, any cop, investigate their own shooting. My precinct is no place for vendettas.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Do we understand each other?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I want my gun.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: So you got to re-qualify. It’s no big deal. It’s a little insulting, but …

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Where are the files on the money trail?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Castle’s got them.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: What were we supposed to do, leave them here so – Gates can find them?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: The first thing she would do is open an investigation on Montgomery.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: You want to see the files, you’re going to have to talk to him. Whatever you do, don’t get caught.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Oh, c’mon. What’s she going to do? Bust me down to traffic?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Worse. It’s not like it was before. We go against her orders on this, we could all lose our badges.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yeah, Ryan. Yeah, what do you got?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: He is paranoid. But right.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well then, I guess I better not get caught.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Hey, got a fresh one. 18th and Lex.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: You coming?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No, I think I’m going to sit this one out.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: She keeps looking into this, we could all lose our jobs.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: What about her life? The shooter’s still out there. How’s she supposed to live like that?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Hum… someone had a party.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Victim is Sonya Gilbert, 27. This is her place.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Sonya Gilbert? The paparazzi's favorite party girl.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Multiple GSWs to the chest. The killer used the pillow as a poor man’s suppressor.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Gunshots to the chest, huh? Good thing Beckett sat this one out.

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Beckett’s back?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yeah. She hasn’t called you either?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Not for weeks.

utterance.content: Victim’s sister found her an hour ago. They were supposed to go shopping today. Alarm system was activated around 10 last night, right after the victim and her boyfriend were seen returning home. It wasn’t deactivated until 9AM this morning. Boyfriend was spotted in the apartment right after that.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Time of death?

utterance.speaker: LANIE
utterance.content: Between 3 and 4AM.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: This boyfriend have a name?

utterance.speaker: UNIFORM
utterance.content: Vic’s sister identified him as a Dale Landers.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: The drummer from Particle Equation. They’ve been dating for six months. People Magazine, what?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Get a unit to his last known, and get an APB out.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Dead celebutante, heavy metal drummer? Castle would have loved this one. Hey, you think maybe Beckett can talk Captain into bringing him back?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: She left him hanging for three months. What makes you think he’s going to want to come back?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, that makes you my favorite fan.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Thank you for coming out.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: How are you?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Kate.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You can make it out to Kate.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Thank you very much. Thank you very much for the hard work. Next time I write a book I’ll be sure to come by. Thanks very much.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle, wait.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I did, three months. You never called.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Look, I know you’re angry –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Oh, you’re damn right, I’m angry.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I watched you die in that ambulance. Did you know that? Do you know what that’s like? Watching the life drain out of someone you –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Someone you care about?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I told you I needed some time.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You said a few days.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I needed more.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, you should have said that.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle, look, I couldn’t call you.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Not without dragging myself into everything that I was just trying to get some space from. I needed some time to just work through everything.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Josh help you with that?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: We broke up.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I like the dedication.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It seemed right.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It must have been hard, writing that ending.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah. Yeah. Given the circumstances, yeah.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So why did you guys break up?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I really, really liked him.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: But that wasn’t enough.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: After my mother was killed, something inside me changed. It’s like I built up this wall inside. And I don’t know, I guess I just didn’t want to hurt like that again. I know I’m not going to be the kind of person that I want to be, I know that I’m not going …

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’m not going to have the kind of relationship that I want until that wall comes down. And it’s not going to happen until I put this thing to rest.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Then I suppose we’re just going to have to find these guys and take them down.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It doesn’t mean I’m still not mad.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: The boys told me about what you did, following the money trail, trying to track down who the cops paid off.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I just wish it led somewhere. I mean, I located the files. When the bank closed they took all the dead account paperwork and stored it in a warehouse in Union City. But a couple years after the move, fire broke out and the files were destroyed. It’s just another dead end.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: How did it happen?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: An accident. It was old wiring.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Are you sure?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah, there was an investigation.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Well, did you see the report from the fire investigator?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No, but … really, a warehouse fire? Seems an awful lot of trouble for a couple of files.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: That’s no more trouble than they’ve already gone through. I mean, we have to read that report. It’s just … there’s this one problem.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: How’re you going to help if Gates kicked you out?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I only let her kick me out because there was no reason to stay.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: She’ll take me back.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Yes, Mr. Mayor. Yes sir, I understand. Okay, I’m –

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: You think you’re clever, Mr. Castle, going around my back like that. Well, let me tell you the score. I don’t care how powerful your friends are. You screw up on my watch and I’ll prosecute you to the full extent of the law. You understand me?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yes ma’am.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Sir.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Sir.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Now get out of my office.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: And Detective?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: You or that … pal, there … embarrass me again? I will bury you.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yes, sir. Now um, if you don’t mind … I’d like my gun back.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Showing her up with the mayor? You might as well have beaten a beehive with a bat.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, it worked, didn’t it? Besides, it sure was great seeing her face twitch like that.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Sonya Gilbert?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Yep. Guns, drugs, and love gone wrong.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Where’re you with the boyfriend?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: APB’s out, but he hasn’t been home and none of his band mates know where he is.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What was his motive?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: The usual. He and the vic had been fighting. He was in love, she wanted out.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Psst! Beckett!

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: I pulled the report on the fire from records. Check the date.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: That warehouse burned down three weeks after my mom’s murder.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: That can’t be a coincidence.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Someone was destroying evidence. Evidence that could lead to your mom’s killers.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: But the investigator ruled it an accident.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: And there’s nothing in there to suggest arson.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Maybe someone altered it.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: There’s an easy way to find out. Just ask the man who wrote the report. Rod Halstead.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Unless they got to him, too.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Nope. He’s alive and on the job. Now get your ass over there and find something we can use to reopen the investigation.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Ryan! Esposito!

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yeah, we were just … we were getting a drink of water.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Saddle up. We just got a hit on the APB. A beat cop ID’ed Sonya Gilbert’s boyfriend heading into the band’s rehearsal garage on the lower East Side. You too, Beckett!

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Hide this.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Hey. You ready for this?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You’re kidding, right?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Okay. But we’ve got point.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: NYPD!

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: NYPD! Let me see your hands right now!

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Let me see them!

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Stop!

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Drop it or I’ll drop you!

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Put it down! Down!

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Get on the ground!

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Same caliber that killed Sonya Gilbert.

utterance.speaker: DALE
utterance.content: It’s not my gun, man. I swear!

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Sit your ass down in that chair!

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Why don’t we start with why you ran? Or why you were pointing a gun at a police officer?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You want to talk about it?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: About what?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Kate, I saw you. When you saw that gun, you froze.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It’s nothing.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Your hand was shaking. That’s not nothing.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle, it’s my second day back. That’s all. It’s no big deal.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: And if it happens again?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It won’t.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Where’re you going?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Find out who burned down that warehouse. Find out who killed my mom.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: C’mon, Dale. We know you killed her. Just tell us why and we’ll tell the DA that you cooperated.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Your gun’s a match, Dale.

utterance.speaker: DALE
utterance.content: I told you! It’s not mine!

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Why were you holding it?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSTO
utterance.content: We have witnesses that have you enter her apartment and then leave.

utterance.speaker: DALE
utterance.content: Yeah, that’s right. I was there, okay? And then … look man, I don’t know. I – I crashed and when I woke up and there was all this blood and this was in my hand.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: So what are you saying, Dale? You sleep shot her?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Is that your defense?

utterance.speaker: DALE
utterance.content: No. Look, I’m saying it wasn’t me.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: So you went to bed and you slept through your girlfriend’s murder.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Six shots. You must be a heavy sleeper.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Motive, opportunity, possession of the weapon? Looks like a murder one trifecta.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: His band mate Mitch Yancey there said he was looking for money to get out of town.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: All right. Contact the DA’s office, have them file charges and let the family know.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yes, sir.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Where did Castle and Beckett go off to?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: They, um … They had another lead they were looking into.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Another lead? You caught the guy.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yeah, they were double checking eye witness accounts. Since it’s a high profile case Beckett wanted to make sure that we didn’t make any mistakes.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: Well, that’s good to hear. Because we wouldn’t want her making any mistakes, now would we?

utterance.speaker: ROD HALSTEAD
utterance.content: Warehouse in Union City. Yeah, yeah, I remember this fire.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: The reports said it was an accident.

utterance.speaker: HALSTEAD
utterance.content: Yeah, that’s right.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And you’re sure?

utterance.speaker: HALSTEAD
utterance.content: Yeah, I’m sure.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: And this report hasn’t been altered in any way since you filed it?

utterance.speaker: HALSTEAD
utterance.content: No, why?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Mr. Halstead, this is very important. Was there anything that you didn’t put in that report?

utterance.speaker: HALSTEAD
utterance.content: What do you mean?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Anything that might indicate suspicious activity.

utterance.speaker: HALSTEAD
utterance.content: Well, if there was anything suspicious, Detective, it would be in the report. Power surge to the junction box. One in a million event.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: So at no point did anyone pressure you into keeping information out of that report.

utterance.speaker: HALSTEAD
utterance.content: You are way out of line here.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I’m out of line? I’m not the one that falsified that report.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Kate …

utterance.speaker: HALSTEAD
utterance.content: Get out of my station.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Who set that fire? Who had you covering –

utterance.speaker: HALSTEAD
utterance.content: Get out!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Okay…

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You tell them that I’m coming after them. You tell them that I’ll find them.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: What the hell are you doing?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: He’s lying.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You don’t know that.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yes, I do.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Esposito. I need you to get me everything you can on Rod Halstead. Yeah, and send it to my apartment. I don’t need Gates looking over my shoulder.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Got it.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: That was Beckett.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: How did it go with Halstead?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: She wants to pull some files. He cut a deal yet?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Nope.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: You know what I don’t get?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: What’s that?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Our time of death is around 3AM. Now, with Dale as our shooter … why did he hang around for another six hours after he shot Sonya?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: He likes to cuddle? I don’t know. It’s not like blowing away your girlfriend is a rational act to begin with. Why?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: If I’m asking the question the jury’s going to be, too.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: This guy’s got multiple citations for valor, commendations from the Mayor, he’s literally saved dozens of people from burning buildings. It’s hard to believe this guy’s dirty.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah well, we’ve been surprised before.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Okay, um … does he intersect with anyone else in the case? Montgomery, Raglan, McCallister?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: No. There’s nothing in the files. He might have known them socially.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: But we’ve been over their lives with a fine tooth comb. He’s never come up once.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Okay, so he was a target of opportunity. He might have needed the money.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Nothing in his financial records to indicate any problems and given his record, he’s …

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Given his record, what?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I’m just saying, what if he’s not our guy? What if the fire was an accident?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It wasn’t an accident. I know it wasn’t an accident.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You can’t know that.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: I can. Because if this was an accident I’ve got nowhere to start. If this was an accident I’ve got nothing. The guy who shot me is gone. Dick Coonan, gone. Hal Lockwood, gone. Montgomery, gone. My mom … everybody is gone, Castle.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Missed you for dinner tonight.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah, I know. I’m sorry. I was working.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: You were with Beckett.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Thought you said you weren’t going back.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I’m not. Look, I’m not. It’s just one case.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Yeah well, there’s leftovers in the fridge.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Hello?

utterance.speaker: MYSTERY MAN
utterance.content: Mr. Castle.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: MYSTERY MAN
utterance.content: I’m a friend of Roy Montgomery’s. I’m calling about Detective Beckett. We need to talk.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Do you have any idea who he was?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Just that he’s a friend of Montgomery’s. Said he owed Montgomery his life. He said Montgomery sent him some files, files that if they ever got out, could hurt some very powerful people. They were using those files as a threat to keep Montgomery’s family from ever being harmed. Beckett’s safety was also part of the deal.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: But they went after her anyway.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: He didn’t get the files until after she was shot. He says she’s safe now, on one condition. She can’t go near the case. If she does, he can’t guarantee her safety. If she digs, they will kill her.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: And this man, you believe him?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I do.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: Then you have to tell her.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: If I tell her that, she’ll put on blinders and run out into the line of fire. I can’t let that happen.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: You are not going to change her, Richard. She’s going to keep going out there and she’s going to keep digging.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Not if I stop her. She will listen to me. I can steer her away.

utterance.speaker: MARTHA
utterance.content: For how long?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I’m not going to lose her again.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: So I guess it’s not just for this case, is it?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: How much did you hear?

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Enough.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Look, it’s really important you don’t say anything, all right? Especially to Beckett.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: You act like this is all about her, but you were standing right next to her. You could have been shot! Hell, I could have been shot!

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: That’s why I have to do this. Make sure they stay away.

utterance.speaker: ALEXIS
utterance.content: Yeah? You need to grow up, Dad. You’re a writer, not a cop. Stop pretending.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Thanks.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Do you remember what you told me the first time I brought up your mother’s case? That if you got started again, you wouldn’t stop. You said it would probably destroy you –

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah well, I didn’t have any leads then.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: We don’t have any now.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Look, Castle, I got a little emotional last night. I’m … I’m fine.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: No you’re not. And you know you’re not. You’ve been back here three days and you’re already in a free fall. I’m not telling you to walk away, I’m just saying … give it time. Just until you get your bearings again.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: How am I supposed to get my bearings when someone out there wants me dead?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: By not letting them rob you of your life. I promise you, we will figure this out. We will find them and we will make them pay. Just not today.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Castle, if I don’t do this, I don’t know who I am.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You’re who you always were. You’re the one who honors the victims. You’re the one who can bring Sonya’s family some peace.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Hey. Anything?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Ah, according to the DA we just turned a slam dunk case into a Hail Mary.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Yeah, super cop over here had to keep digging so, you know.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And?

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: CSU found trace residue of barbiturates in the vodka glasses, which means Dale and Sonya were both roofied when they got back to the apartment.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Well, it still could have been the boyfriend, right? I mean, he could have meant to roofie her but roofied them both instead, not that that makes any sense.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Well, what other explanation is there? There was no one else in the apartment, and according to the security system no one entered or left the apartment between 10PM and 9AM.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Which means the boyfriend has to be the shooter.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Unless …

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: The killer was in the apartment the whole time.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: When they came home they thought they were alone.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Meanwhile, while they’re out of the room the killer slips out, spikes their drinks, and slips back into his hiding place where he –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Or she.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: - waits for them to pass out.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Literally lying and waiting.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: That’s creepy.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And then a couple of hours later he slips out again, grabs a pillow and bam, and he –

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Or she.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: - wipes the gun clean and puts it into Dale’s hand.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: He wakes up, he panics, he runs, all the while our killer bides his time, waiting until the body is discovered before he makes his –

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Or her.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: - escape. Gentlemen, would you?

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: One, two, three.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: The blood stain on the bottom of the mattress dripped down onto the carpet. There’s no drip marks in the middle.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Your light?

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Ah. Fingerprints.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Someone was here.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Looks like they found a killer hiding place.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Hiding under a bed for hours while the girl you just shot bleeds out? You’ve got to be one sick bastard to do something like that.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: It’s actually pretty clever. You commit a murder and frame an innocent man all at the same time.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: And then you get away with it because the police already think they have their killer and no one’s looking for you.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Mitch Yancey. That’s Dale’s band mate.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Let’s go.

utterance.speaker: ESPOSITO
utterance.content: Ryan. Let’s go.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: You okay?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: I don’t even think –

utterance.speaker: MITCH
utterance.content: Put the gun down!

utterance.speaker: MITCH
utterance.content: I said, put it down! Just … let me walk out of here, okay? That’s all I want.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Don’t … don’t … don’t move, Mitch!

utterance.speaker: MITCH
utterance.content: I’ll shoot you, I swear.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Take it easy, Kate.

utterance.speaker: MITCH
utterance.content: I just need you to let me go.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Take it easy. You’ve got this. You’ve got this.

utterance.speaker: MITCH
utterance.content: Put it down and stay back. Stay back!

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: You don’t want to do this, Mitch. Because I will have to put you down. Do you understand?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Put that gun down, now.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Turn around, put your hands behind your head.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: Mitch Yancey, you’re under arrest.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: Turns out Mitch had been seeing Sonya secretly for a year, all the time she was with Dale.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: Mitch insisted she leave Dale, but instead she broke it off with him. So this was Mitch’s plan to take care of them both.

utterance.speaker: RYAN
utterance.content: He knew Sonya’s security code, but to frame Dale he knew that the system couldn’t record anyone else entering or exiting the apartment around the time of the murder, so he used a key that he’d stolen to slip in hours earlier in the day.

utterance.speaker: GATES
utterance.content: All right, cut the boyfriend loose. I’ll brief the press and let them know that we have a confession.

utterance.speaker: CASTLE
utterance.content: So, how does it feel?

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: It’s not enough.

utterance.speaker: BECKETT
utterance.content: But … it’s enough for now.
